<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="Default">fef4d757c3f5e2109642f61ed401318b</macroponent><name>button_2/isHidden</name><preset/><required_translations>[]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {TransformApiHelpers} params.helpers
 */
function evaluateProperty({
    api,
    helpers
}) {
    console.log("Hi Cards");
    console.log(api.data.own_subscriptions.results[0].course.value.sys_id,api.item.value.sys_id);

    return api.data.own_subscriptions.results.some(
        sub => sub.course.value === api.item.value.sys_id.value
    );
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-06-05 12:24:22</sys_created_on><sys_id>4d26cd80c386a6109642f61ed4013152</sys_id><sys_mod_count>17</sys_mod_count><sys_name>button_2/isHidden</sys_name><sys_package display_value="CourseHub" source="x_quo_coursehub">d7affc501bf0ded0afce657a234bcb67</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="CourseHub">d7affc501bf0ded0afce657a234bcb67</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_4d26cd80c386a6109642f61ed4013152</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-06-05 13:04:18</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>transform</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
